responses: Hello! How can I assist you with your finances today?
Hi there! Need help with investments or budgeting?

patterns: How can I budget my money?
responses: Start by tracking your income and expenses. Allocate funds to needs, wants, and savings (50/30/20 rule).
Use budgeting apps like Mint or YNAB to manage your monthly spending.

patterns: How should I invest my money?
responses: Consider diversifying into stocks, mutual funds, and ETFs. Always assess your risk tolerance.
If you're a beginner, start with index funds and learn about dollar-cost averaging.

patterns: How to improve my credit score?
responses: Pay your bills on time, keep your credit utilization low, and avoid too many hard inquiries.
Monitor your credit report regularly for errors and maintain a good mix of credit.
